title: Taidor Kids 2Pcs Warm Knit Beanie Hat and Scarf Soft Fleece Lined Beanie Cap Knitted Skull Cap for Boys Girls

Warm and soft: This soft fleece lined beanie cap is made of thick and comfortable acrylic cable woven fabric and soft wool lining for better warmth. Your child will feel warm and comfortable in the cold weather.
description: - Soft wool lining provide better insulation, just enjoy the maximum warmth.
